trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Longmont
There were no other sightings in Longmont on or around June 30th 1999
divs: sighting detailsi was young when i saw this ufo so i do not recall an exact date\time, i used to visit my father in colorado every summer and one of those summer days i was at the carwash helping my stepmom wash the car when in clear view i spotted this object. it was sunny out, about noon, some clouds in the sky it was very easy to spot and other people at the carwash had also taken notice. i couldn't take my eyes off of it, it was a sphere shape large and shiny, just sitting in the sky not moving. i grew up around star wars and the first thing to come to my mind was "this looks like the death star", it was big, from where its position was it looked as big as looking at a full moon in the sky, and it was silver i recall it was kinda glistening. it was in the same position for around 11 minutes when it started to get fainter than just dissapeared from sight. i really wish i had had a camera that day.
Summary: Shiny Silver Object spotted In Sky, BIG, Best Described as "Death-Star"
